p: During the years of effort in developing the PCCM subspecialty, no one would have foreseen an outbreak of COVID-19; however, with the designed professional scope of the program, the key role of the PCCM subspecialty in such epidemics or any other epidemics characterized by respiratory disease leading to critical conditions has been very clear. PCCM in China is an excellent model for collaboration among international professional societies. The COVID-19 epidemic has seriously challenged China, while also proving to be a common threat worldwide that warrants collaboration.
